data.system_settings: AMD Radeon RX 460, Windows 10 Home, Creators Update(edited)
data.client_settings: Everything default, except zoomed out once
data.actual_result: The server remains, and will be like that until the profile is closed and reopened.
data.expected_result: When you leave the server through mutuals, it vanishes from the list
data.short_description: When you leave a server through someones mutual servers, it stays no matter how many times you try to leave.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to someones profile - Go to Mutual Servers - Right-Click on a server, leave it - It stays, presumably.- Try to leave it again
